data.name: jFood_st
data.value: This is how much food you are consuming and how much food your Farm Land can produce.

data.name: jFood_t
data.value:
Unlike Silver, food is perishable and cannot be stored therefore this number is NOT how much food you have but rather how much food you are currently consuming and how much food your Farm Land can produce.

Food is necessary to maintain an army as well as to upgrade your buildings.

Your troops consume food. You can recruit an army no larger than what the Farm Land can support.

Buildings, indirectly, require food as well since every building requires workers to maintain it and those workers consume food. With each level, the building needs more work, hence more food.

data.name: jFromUnknown_st
data.value: Origin unknown; You are being spied on!

data.name: jFromUnknown_t
data.value:
Sometimes the origin of the attack cannot be ascertained.

This can only occur if this attack is composed only of spies. Spies move covertly therefore you maybe unable to tell where they are coming from.

The more spies you have at a village, the more likely you will know the origin of a spy attack.

data.name: jIncomingAttack_t
data.value:
Warning! You are under attack!!

Clicking this message will take you to the Incoming Troop's page that will show you, among other things all incoming attacks.

You may want to call on your friends & clan members for support as well.

data.name: jOverdue_st
data.value: Click this link to refresh the page

data.name: jOverdue_t
data.value:
Sometimes an event such as a building upgrade or attack does not get processed on time beacuse of high server load. In this case you will see this overdue message.

Please be assured that alghough an event may get processed late, all events will occur in their correct order.

You can click the \'Overdue!\' link to manually refresh the page.

If the problem persists, it could mean there is a server problem. In this case, please contact support and just enter \'overdue\' in the subject and body and support will investigate

data.name: jServerTime_t
data.value: Server Time - In order for all players in different time zone to communicate, all time is based on UTC

data.name: jSilverProd_st
data.value: This is how much silver your Silver Mine produces every hour.

data.name: jSilverProd_t
data.value:
Your Silver Mine constantly produces silver (even if you are not logged in). This is how much silver is produced every hour. You can produce more silver by upgrading the Silver Mine.

Please note that silver is stored in the Treasury. Treasury has a limit to the amount of silver it can store. Once the Treasury fills up, the silver production is halted. It is a good practice to spend your silver before this happens.

data.name: jSilver_st
data.value: This is your current silver and maximum silver you can store in the Treasury

data.name: jSilver_t
data.value:
The number before the \'/\' is your current silver. You can use this silver to upgrade buildings, recruit troops etc

The number after the \'/\', is your Treasury size, ie, the maximum amount of silver you can store. Note that once your Treasury fills up, your Silver Mine stops producing silver so make sure you spend your silver before the Treasury fills up.

data.name: jVillName_st
data.value: This is the name of your village. You can change it in Headquarters building
